name: Nutella Marshmallow French Toast Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: chocolate hazelnut spread, marshmallow, white bread, egg, double cream, butter
recipeInstructionSteps: Spread nutella on both slices of white bread.
Cut marshmallows in half and place on one side of the bread.
Whisk together 2 eggs and the double cream.
Dip nutella marshmallow sandwich in mixture.
Fry in butter until both sides are golden brown.
